short_description: balder ip is a patent attorney based in madrid, spain.
long_description: balder is one of spain's most innovative ip law firms, founded in madrid in 2012. as a result of a mix of nationalities, cultures, and backgrounds we have taken a different, modern, and flexible approach to ip law. we offer a complete range of legal services designed to help you protect your patents and innovations to succeed in a global competitive market. balder was founded in 2012 by professionals with different nationalities and different backgrounds, but one thing in common: many years of experience in providing consultancy services relating to intellectual property. with a flexible structure that allows adaptation to the specific needs and wishes of each client, balder provides the full range of services offered by ip boutique firms, including prosecution and litigation in relation to patents, trademarks, designs, copyright and unfair competition, world-wide. for further information please visit our website www.balderip.com or contact us at info@balderip.com
business_tags: court and litigation | legalization services | intellectual property | law firm | data & protection | patent & trademark
generated_description: balder is a spanish intellectual property (ip) law firm founded in madrid in 2012. with a diverse team of professionals from various nationalities, cultures, and backgrounds, balder offers a modern and flexible approach to ip law. they provide a comprehensive range of legal services to help clients protect their patents and innovations for success in a global market. with years of experience in intellectual property consultancy, balger offers a full range of services including prosecution and litigation in patents, trademarks, designs, copyright, and unfair competition worldwide.
